ValidationRule.description: Requires leads to have an Address (Street, City, State, Zip, Country, Phone and Email) to be populated before the status can be set to Qualifying. Update: COD-1445, If Lead Source equals 'ZoomInfo', then Country not required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Alias <> "autocln", $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, ISPICKVAL(Status, "Qualifying"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "ZoomInfo")), OR( ISBLANK(PostalCode), ISBLANK(Country), ISBLANK(City), ISBLANK(Street), ISBLANK(Phone), ISBLANK(Email)), NOT($Setup.BypassRules__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Street, City, State, Postal Code, Country, Phone and Email fields are all required in order to set the Lead Status to Qualifying.
